text: U.S. Route 27 or U.S. Highway 27 (US 27) is a northâ€“south United States higway in the southern and midwestern United States. The southern end is at US 1 in Miami, Florida. The northern end is at Interstate 69 (I-69), US 24, and US 30 in Fort Wayne, Indiana. The highway is long. ==References== Category:U.S. Highways
title: U.S. Route 27
